page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: This is a rural area relying heavily on personal rather than public transport. There is a single{bus} through Braceby and Sapperton on Saturday afternoon to Grantham;Ropsley has a regular bus service.There is a school bus to Corby Glen Secondary school and village children go to Ropsley Primary school by taxi. Caythorpe Agricultural College also has a mini-bus service for students. There are 31{cars}in the area as well as{bicycles} and{motor bikes.}There is a good network of minor{roads}giving reasonable access. The width of these roads is such that for cars to pass it's usually necessary to drive on the verge.The roads are kept in reasonable repair by the County Council. The narrow roads are liable to closure by drifting snow, clearance is by local farmers as agents of the Council.
